trans-unit.source: Defines an interface that enables the extension of specific behaviors of an HTML control designer.
trans-unit.target: HTML 컨트롤 디자이너의 특정 동작을 확장할 수 있도록 하는 인터페이스를 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior> interface is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 이와 동일한 컨트롤 디자이너 기능을 사용하려면 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> 인터페이스를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer that the behavior is associated with.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" /> that the behavior is associated with.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior" /> interface is obsolete.
Use the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 이와 동일한 컨트롤 디자이너 기능을 사용하려면 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> 인터페이스를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the designer is associated with.
The object that the designer is associated with.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior" /> interface is obsolete.
Use the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 이와 동일한 컨트롤 디자이너 기능을 사용하려면 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> 인터페이스를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The attribute to retrieve.
<see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성 구문이 대/소문자를 구분하지 않으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified attribute.
The attribute that was retrieved.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.GetAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> 에서 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 동일한 컨트롤 디자이너 기능에 대 한 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The style attribute to retrieve.
<see langword="true" /> if the attribute is only active at design time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성이 디자인 타임에만 활성화되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성 구문이 대/소문자를 구분하지 않으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified style attribute.
The style attribute that was retrieved.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.GetStyleAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> 에서 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> 동일한 컨트롤 디자이너 기능에 대 한 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The attribute to remove.
<see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성 구문이 대/소문자를 구분하지 않으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified attribute.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.RemoveAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.RemoveAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.RemoveAttribute%2A> 에서 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 동일한 컨트롤 디자이너 기능에 대 한 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The style attribute to remove.
<see langword="true" /> if the attribute is only active at design time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성이 디자인 타임에만 활성화되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성 구문이 대/소문자를 구분하지 않으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified style attribute.
The attribute to set.
The object on which to set the attribute.
<see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성 구문이 대/소문자를 구분하지 않으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified attribute to the specified object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> 에서 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 동일한 컨트롤 디자이너 기능에 대 한 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The attribute to set.
<see langword="true" /> if the attribute is only active at design-time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성이 디자인 타임에만 활성화되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to set the attribute on.
<see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 특성 구문이 대/소문자를 구분하지 않으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified style attribute to the specified object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetStyleAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> 에서 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> 동일한 컨트롤 디자이너 기능에 대 한 클래스입니다.
